Zeitlos guter Rätselspaß, verpackt in einem 3D Shooter mit packender Story, v.a. wenn man sich für das Half Life Unterversum interessiert  (Achtung, Vorkenntnisse der Handlung aus Portal 1 und ggf Half Life ist empfehlenswert).  Das Spiel setzt beim schon sehr guten Vorgänger an Ideenreichtum und Rätseldesign noch einmal einen drauf und ich würde wirklich was dafür geben, es nochmal "wie beim ersten Mal" erleben zu können.

Because I had the opportunity to get this game for a low price, alongside Portal 1, I took the opportunity and decided to try it out. Since I started playing, I beat both games in two days, and they are now my favorite games. Thanks Valve!
It is a funny story, has good controls and great puzzles.

Eine Art Escape-Room. Das Schöne daran, dass es sowohl alleine als auch mit einem Freund geht, und das online, oder lokal mit Split-Screen. Für 0,81 EUR habe ich zugeschlagen und gleich alle damit ausgestattet.

One of the best games available on steam, the greates game created by Valve (In my opinion of course). It almost doesn't have any flaws, the only problem I had is a really annoying glitch within co-op, some levels don't mark as "completed" and you can't progress further without using noclip, which disables achievements. If Valve fixes that, I can say without any doubts that this game is perfecctly made. Either way, you still need to check it out, you obviously have to play Portal 1. I also recommend checking out some community made campagins such as Portal Stories: Mel or Aperture Tag.
es un tremendo juegazo se lo recomiendo efusivamente a cualquier fan de velve

Amazing story telling and wonderful puzzle design. Lots of fun interactions with the hilarious characters. Played this over and over again to see how well I could keep clearing each puzzle. So many fun user-crafted puzzles you might never reach the end of the gameplay.
intuitivo! divertido! bom para jogar com os amigos!

The puzzles in the game are not frustrating but require just enough effort, mainly exploreing the map, to make them fun. On top of that, the story is well told and interesting, with engaging characters.
Once you've figured out the game mechanics, the rest of the game should be easy enough and you can enjoy the story while solving the puzzles.

Fun and challenging, even though you don't get instructions on what you really have to do, the way you have to solve puzzles become intuitive, even though it doesn't feel repetitive. Some really hard levels to get the head scratching! Was loads of fun. The story line was great as it was comedic.
me brain hurt when i play dis game must mean i am smart cool like great game nice very cool 6/10 yes

Отличная игра. Разомнёт Ваши мозги на предмет решения топологических головоломок :) Ну и интересный сюжет из вселенной Half-Life(правда сюжет отдельный и с основным никак не пересекающийся).

Although the jokes this game produced have been done to death, the writing was original at its time and helped to expand the lore of its predecessor while narrowly avoiding the foggy pit that can cause a sequel to spoil a fan's appreciation of a masterpiece that stood on its own just fine.

The game is longer (and more challenging towards the end) but it has more obvious loading screens which seem to be just a little too frequent, in part because of the length of the game in comparison to the previous. Fun new twists on old puzzle concepts keep the game fresh throughout its duration, and there's cool audio and musical creativity to appreciate.

For every feeling of annoyance one might feel from the game being different from the first in a "bad" way there's a piece of the game that shows its love for the source material with such grandiosity that cynics such as myself can't help but smile and appreciate all the effort put into crafting a proper homage to its brilliant counterpart.

Multiplayer is pretty neat, too. Give it a shot if you have a friend who'd like to play Portal 2 too.
